"Break down Vid Gilos piece by piece!":
"Professor, I'm counting on you again! This time
I'd like you to teach me about Vid Gilos, found at the
bottom of the ocean of Planet Wopal! Based on what
I hear, they also break the head and defeat is possible
etc. For me, I have been told that those are my
weaknesses and I do not have confidence!
Please show me how to attack!

*Defeat a Lv.60 or higher Vid Gilos and it
is defeated after its centre head has been broken"
"ヴィド・ギロスの部位破壊を！"

"先生、今回もよろしくお願いします！
惑星ウォパルの海底にいるヴィド・ギロス
について教えていただきたいです！
話によると、ヤツも頭部を破壊して
撃破が可能だとか。
自分、そこが弱点だと言われても
確信が持てません！　攻めようがないです。
是非お手本を見せてください！
※Lv.60以上のヴィド・ギロスの
中央の頭を破壊してから撃破する"
